content:
I recently tried installing a .deb packagae I had made by converting an rpm. Synaptic package manager however errored and since then won't open. Every time I started synaptic I was getting this error: The package vmware-server needs to be reinstalled, but I can't find an archive for it This command solved it and will force the removal of my incosistent package: 
dpkg --remove --force-remove-reinstreq vmware-server
title: The package vmware-server needs to be reinstalled, but I can't find an archive for it
name: the-package-vmware-server-needs-to-be-reinstalled-but-i-cant-find-an-archive-for-it
